title: Interview: Broadway Playwright Jeremy O. Harris On 'Slave Play'
description: One of Broadway's hottest tickets last year was a play with no big-name actors by a 30-year-old black queer writer. Jeremy O. Harris talks to Sam about poking the bear that is Broadway, and whether he thinks he'll be embraced there long-term. Email the show at samsanders@npr.org.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: Interview: Broadway Playwright Jeremy O. Harris On 'Slave Play'
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Whether he thinks Broadway will embrace him for the long haul.
itunes:subtitle: Whether he thinks Broadway will embrace him for the long haul.
